thread.title: Paul Reubens will play the Penguin's dad (again) - this time on Gotham - Gotham Cult
thread.title_full: Paul Reubens will play the Penguin's dad (again) - this time on Gotham - Gotham News - Cult - Digital Spy

author: Megan Davies
title: Paul Reubens will play the Penguin's dad (again) - this time on Gotham - Gotham Cult
text: Paul Reubens is set to return to the role he created by starring as the Penguin's father Tucker Cobblepot in the second season of Gotham.Tucker Cobblepot made his DC debut in 1992 when Reubens originated the role in Tim Burton's Batman Returns and now Reubens will once again play parent to the Penguin in the Fox series. © PA Images / Damian Dovarganes / AP News of the casting was revealed by fellow cast member Robin Lord Taylor, who plays Oswald Cobblepot/The Penguin, during a New York Comic-Con panel on Sunday (October 11)."So we're all familiar with Oswald's mother, the fabulous, fabulous Carol Kane," the actor said during the event. "[But] We don't know a lot about his father… We just found out that I do have a father. And he will be showing up very soon, and he will be played by none other than Paul Reubens, aka Pee-wee Herman! He's playing my dad! What! The! Hell!"Taylor continued to share his excitement for the casting on Twitter, writing: "Big news: Paul Reubens will be playing Penguin's father in Gotham. Unreal. I have the best tv parents. Legends."Big news: Paul Reubens will be playing Penguin's father in @Gotham. Unreal. I have the best tv parents. Legends. pic.twitter.com/45v6iiks4y— Robin Lord Taylor (@robinlordtaylor) October 11, 2015Reubens's casting follows on from the news that Raul Castillo has joined the cast as Eduardo Flamingo, and further adds to Alfred actor Sean Pertwee's promise that "all hell breaks loose" in season two.Gotham airs on Mondays at 8/7c on Fox in the US and is coming soon to the UK.Watch the cast reveal what's in store for the new season below: function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4350053429001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14350053429001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4350053429001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4350053429001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14350053429001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4350053429001.init(); ai_type="video"; }
